2109480.name: Wild West Dynasty: The New Hope Gazette - Complete Collection
2109480.description:
Interesting insights into the development process of the game, carefully researched historical facts and exciting stories: All this and much more awaits you in Wild West Dynasty: The New Hope Gazette. Get all issues now and look forward to 8 periodically published digital magazines (the first one for free), which will be available to you automatically every 4 - 6 weeks!

  • The collection of all issues of Wild West Dynasty: The New Hope Gazette with 8 digital magazines (#1 for free)
  • A new issue will be available every 4 - 6 weeks
  • Experience, discover and learn all about the game Wild West Dynasty, its iconic setting and stories, that shaped the game world!
2109480.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
